gov.fnal.controls.base.fermiatom
Interface FermiAtomRenderer

All Known Implementing Classes:
FermiAtom.Renderer
public interface FermiAtomRenderer

Interface for the renderer class that will be defined by each implementation of FermiAtom. Each FermiAtom implementation must return an implementation of this class from its getRenderer method.

Note: The getRenderer method of each distinct FermiAtom subclass will be invoked at most once. The FermiAtomRenderer that is returned is cached. A complete set of Swing components necessary to display the FermiAtom should be created during the construction phase. These display components should be reused every time the configureFermiAtomDisplay method is invoked; a new set of display components should not be created each time.

Also note: if the implementation is an inner class, it should be declared static.

Version:
$Revision: 1.2 $ $Author: devoy $
Author:
John DeVoy

Method Detail

configureFermiAtomDisplay

public JComponent configureFermiAtomDisplay(FermiAtom fermiAtom)
Configure the display component based on the argument.

NOTE: The same JComponent should be configured and returned each time this method is called. Do not instantiate a new set of display components every time.

Parameters:
fermiAtom - the FermiAtom to be displayed
Returns:
a JComponent that displays the FermiAtom.

removeFermiAtomDisplay

public void removeFermiAtomDisplay()
Invoked when the JComponent returned by configurefermiAtomDisplay() is about to be removed from the display. This is intended to give the renderer a chance to save state if necessary. This method will be invoked before the component is actually removed.

getDisplayComponent

public JComponent getDisplayComponent()
Return the top level JComponent being used to display a FermiAtom. It is not meaningful to invoke this method before configureFermiAtomDisplay has been invoked.
Returns:
the toplevel display component

getDisplayedFermiAtom

public FermiAtom getDisplayedFermiAtom()
Return the FermiAtom being displayed. It is not meaningful to invoke this method before configureFermiAtomDisplay has been invoked.
Returns:
the currently displayed FermiAtom

getActions

public List getActions()
Return an (immutable) list of Actions that can be added to the edit menu of the controlling application. If no actions are defined, then an empty list should be returned.

Similarly to above, the same Actions should be returned each time (the list itself may be cloned each time, but the elements should be the same).

Returns:
a list of objects that implement the action interface
